prompt: Portrait of woman with FLORAL WALLPAPER behind her, but the wallpaper pattern CONTINUES ACROSS HER FACE, flowers and leaves painted on skin and hair, pattern does not stop at figure edge, flat gouache style, hard edges, pattern ignoring form

Figure wearing STRIPED DRESS but the stripes CONTINUE onto bare arms and neck and background, vertical stripes escape the clothing and paint across skin and wall, pattern refusing to stay contained, flat color gouache style, hard edges

Figure standing on BLACK AND WHITE CHECKERED FLOOR, but the checkerboard pattern CLIMBS UP THEIR LEGS AND BODY, checks consuming the human form, chess board logic infecting the figure, flat color cut paper style, hard edges

Portrait with strong light and shadow on face, but SHADOW AREAS FILLED WITH GEOMETRIC PATTERN instead of dark tone, triangles and diamonds where shadows should be, decoration replacing light logic, flat gouache style, hard edges

Portrait where BACKGROUND STRIPES and FACE COLOR ZONES are the same continuous system, vertical colored bands cross from wall across face across other wall, no separation between figure and ground, flat color hard edges, cut paper collage style

Still life on PATTERNED TABLECLOTH but the pattern INFECTS THE OBJECTS, fruit becoming striped, vase becoming checkered, bowl with polka dots, pattern spreading from cloth onto everything it touches, flat gouache style, hard edges

TWO FIGURES side by side, one wearing polka dot dress, one wearing solid dress, but the POLKA DOTS ARE MIGRATING from one figure to the other, pattern contagious, dots appearing on the solid figure, flat color gouache style, hard edges

Interior room where EVERYTHING has become pattern, striped walls striped floor striped furniture striped figure, all the same stripe system, no solid areas remain, pattern consuming all form, flat color cut paper style, hard edges
